title: Famous Grouse
author: Famous Grouse
content: One of blockchains biggest challenges is the security risks from hackers due to lack of identity and trust verifier.How can this be solve?

comments.author: Yogee
comments.body: This isn't just about decentralization security since hacking and Phishing has been around even before blockchains became popular. Just be extra careful with the links you click and double check the addresses before you input any personal information. Little things like bookmarking the legitimate sites helps a lot.

comments.author: Jawhead999
comments.body: Quote from: Famous Grouse on October 31, 2022, 12:53:06 PMOne of blockchains biggest challenges is the security risks from hackers due to lack of identity and trust verifier.How can this be solve? What are you talking about? did you mean the highest security in blockchain need to record everyone KYC? it's a joke since someone can fake their KYC and KYC will become useless. Not to mention the hacker can hack the blockchain to get every KYC of people who submitted before and the hacker will use their KYC to make them in trouble. So does KYC will become a solution for to track the hacker? obviously not.

comments.author: Lizzylove1
comments.body: Cybersecurity issues are not limited to decentralized protocols alone but inclusive of centralized system. Developers should always ensure they are up to date with their security network, and they must partner with reputable security firms for protection and they should have their security team too. Just the way good men are busy trying to secure the society, so also evil men are out to beat the security.
